net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: dnd5e_Util_JSON_sortObjectArray
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip:
Sorts and array of objects arg(0) = Array of JSON objects arg(1) = common field for all JSON objects with which to base the sort on
Returns an array of the objects, sorted by the specified field; Duplicate values are arbitrarily ordered together
